title: The Anne of Green Gables Cookbook
description: Inspired by the most famous Canadian children's book, Anne of Green Gables, this charming cookbook combines easy, step-by-step recipes with appealing watercolors and drawings of Anne and her friends. Quotations from the ever-popular Anne books are sprinkled throughout. Recipes includeold-fashioned lemonade, "cowcumber" boats, gingersnaps, vanilla ice cream, and butterscotch pudding, accompanied by cooking tips and terms for beginning cooks. All twenty-five recipes were kitchen-tested with outstanding results by a 12-year-old!
author: Kate Macdonald
